pkgmetadata.longdescription: Example ChIP-Seq data for the MMDiff package // Subset of BAM files, including WT_2.bam, Null_2.bam, Resc_2.bam, Input.bam from the "Cfp1" experiment (see Clouaire et al., Genes Dev. 2012). Data is available under ArrayExpress accession numbers E-ERAD-79. Additionally, corresponding subset of peaks called by MACS
